summary: The 'Deregulating Restrictions on Interstate Vehicles and Eighteen-wheelers Act' (DRIVE Act), introduced in the House of Representatives on April 10, 2025, aims to prohibit the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration (FMCSA) from mandating speed-limiting devices on vehicles weighing over 26,000 pounds operating in interstate commerce. The bill's intent is to deregulate aspects of interstate trucking.
